Articles.Content:
So I know there is a mod that can change the helmet for your kerbal. I was wondering if anyone has made a Jet Pilot helmet like the one in this picture. I think it would be fun to have my kerbal flying a jet with one of these on.

![AdQfisP.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/AdQfisP.jpg)

Just saw I posted this in the wrong area. Sorry about that, Please move it if you can.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-25T19:43:07Z" title="03/25/2015 07:43  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 25, 2015</time> by Recognize-Me-**

I think this mod has one.

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/99013-Pro-Props-Wearable-items-for-your-kerbals-KAS-dependant-KIS-in-progress](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/99013-Pro-Props-Wearable-items-for-your-kerbals-KAS-dependant-KIS-in-progress)
